00053 class QDoubleSpinBox;

00059 
00064 class MapDialog : public QDialog
00065 {
00066     Q_OBJECT
00067 
00068 public:
00069     MapDialog( QWidget * = 0 );
00070     virtual ~MapDialog(){}
00071 
00072         void GetCoordinates( double* lon, double* lat ) const;

00074     bool sideBarShown() const;
00075 
00076 public slots:
00077     void UpdateCurrentPosition( qreal lon, qreal lat, GeoDataCoordinates::Unit );
00078     void ChangeGPSPosition();
00079 
00080 private:
00081         Marble::MarbleWidget*           m_marbleWidget;
00082     Marble::MarbleControlBox*   m_control;
00083     Marble::MapThemeManager*    m_mapThemeManager;
00084     QSplitter*                  m_splitter;
00085 
00086     QDoubleSpinBox*     m_latSpinBox;
00087     QComboBox*                  m_latComboBox;
00088     QDoubleSpinBox*     m_lonSpinBox;

00090 
00091     double                              m_longitude; //positive east
00092     double                              m_latitude;     //positive north
00093 };
